home.economics.heading: Pricing That Reflects Real Movement
home.economics.label: Adaptive Economics
home.economics.list.1: Fewer detours → lower cost + lower emissions
home.economics.text1: Delivery pricing adapts to urgency, distance, route overlap, and available capacity.
home.enterprise.heading: Programmable Logistics
home.enterprise.orchestration.events.1: Next leg locked — Van carrier assigned
home.enterprise.pilotReport: Pilot reports include: cost delta, detour reduction, on-time rate, and CO₂ avoided — per corridor.
home.enterprise.subheading: Connect Once. Access a Growing Network.
home.enterprise.text1: Businesses integrate with GoLynk through a real-time dashboard or direct API.
home.enterprise.text2: Shipments can be created, tracked, consolidated, and analyzed within a single operational layer.
home.enterprise.text3: Whether moving individual parcels, recurring retail flows, B2B shipments, or institutional documents — the system adapts.
home.environment.cards.assetLight.descri: We coordinate spare capacity instead of adding new vehicles. Less duplication. More utilization.
home.environment.cards.assetLight.title: Asset-Light by Design
home.environment.cards.carbon.descriptio: Impact can be calculated per shipment, route, or corridor—built for ESG reporting.
home.environment.cards.carbon.title: Measurable Carbon Impact
home.environment.cards.density.descripti: More overlap reduces detours and avoids extra trips.
home.environment.cards.density.title: Density Improves Outcomes
home.environment.cards.traceable.descrip: Every handoff is tracked with proof of delivery and audit trails.
home.environment.cards.traceable.title: Traceable End-to-End
home.environment.description: Avoided by coordination — not offset by credit purchases.
home.environment.description2: Because GoLynk coordinates journeys already happening, fewer additional trips are required.
home.environment.heading: Efficiency Reduces Emissions
home.environment.label: Environment
home.environment.paragraph1: Empty kilometers decline. Route density improves. Emissions decrease through coordination.
home.environment.paragraph2: Carbon savings can be measured and reported over time.

home.finalCta.heading: Build the Next Layer of Logistics.

home.fullStack.description: GoLynk starts with last-mile and mid-mile coordination—then expands across larger flows as the network grows.
home.fullStack.heading: One Network Across Every Distance.
home.fullStack.label: The Full Stack

home.fullStack.steps.freightBulk.text: Larger loads and recurring B2B routes.

home.hero.description: We match shipments to spare space already moving — and chain them through verified handoffs.
home.hero.heading: The World Already Moves. We Turn Movement Into Infrastructure.
home.hero.subtitle1: For shippers: lower cost & predictable routing. For carriers: monetize spare capacity.
home.hero.subtitle2: Built for businesses, fleets, individuals, and cities.
home.howItWorks.closing: Simple on the surface. Structured beneath.
home.howItWorks.description: Every delivery is structured, composed, and verified across existing movement — not isolated vehicles.
home.howItWorks.heading: A Shipment Becomes a Coordinated Journey.
home.howItWorks.label: How the Network Operates
home.howItWorks.steps.0.text: Walkers, drivers, fleets, and microhubs publish available capacity across routes they are already operating.
home.howItWorks.steps.0.title: Capacity Is Published
home.howItWorks.steps.1.text: Shipments are structured into single or multi-step paths. The system aligns them with overlapping routes while minimizing detours and delays.
home.howItWorks.steps.1.title: The Route Is Chained
home.howItWorks.steps.2.text: Every transfer is tracked, verified, and documented — from origin to final recipient.
home.howItWorks.steps.2.title: Handoffs Are Verified
home.problem.cards.fragmentedRoutes.text: Shipments move as single trips instead of shared, coordinated paths.
home.problem.cards.invisibleEmissions.te: Emissions rise when overlap isn't captured and detours become normal.
home.problem.cards.underusedCapacity.tex: Two vehicles take the same corridor — both half empty.
home.problem.description: Vehicles return empty. Cars travel with unused space. Ships sail below capacity. Routes overlap inefficiently. Emissions rise without purpose.
home.problem.description2: Unused movement is wasted money. And wasted carbon.
home.problem.heading: Billions of kilometers move every day. Efficiency does not.
home.problem.label: The Hidden Cost of Movement
home.roadmap.description: Starting with last mile and mid mile via microhubs — expanding over time to long-haul capacity across the logistics ecosystem.
home.roadmap.heading: From Last Mile to the Full Logistics Stack
home.roadmap.later.title: Later
home.roadmap.next.title: Next
home.roadmap.now.title: Now
home.solution.heading: Coordination at Infrastructure Scale
home.solution.text1: GoLynk does not add more vehicles to the road. It connects the ones already moving.
home.solution.text2: Existing routes become structured capacity. Fleets integrate spare space and backhaul. Microhubs enable verified handoffs at natural intersections. Businesses connect through dashboard or API.
home.solution.text3: Movement becomes coordinated. Efficiency becomes structural.
home.solution.text4: Instead of adding vehicles, we make existing movement behave like one synchronized system.
home.stories.cafe.heading: A Corner Space, A New Revenue Stream
home.stories.cafe.label: The Café Microhub
home.stories.cafe.text: An unused café corner became a GoLynk microhub, generating steady side income, more foot traffic, and local visibility—with almost no operational effort.
home.stories.carrier.heading: Turning Empty Miles Into Revenue
home.stories.carrier.label: The Regional Carrier
home.stories.carrier.text: Empty return trips became paid capacity once backhauls were plugged into GoLynk, adding new revenue without new routes or extra miles.
home.stories.florist.heading: From Wilting Margins to Fresh Profits
home.stories.florist.label: The Florist
home.stories.florist.text: Same‑day deliveries via nearby bike carriers cut damage and delays, boosting customer happiness and turning premium bouquets into a greener, higher‑margin service.
home.stories.heading: Real Routes. Real Impact.
home.technology.cards.impact.micro: Audit-ready data feeds directly into ESG reporting.
home.technology.cards.impact.outcome: Measure carbon saved per shipment through shared capacity.
home.technology.cards.impact.title: Impact
home.technology.cards.matching.outcome: Instantly fit each shipment to available capacity with minimal detour.
home.technology.cards.matching.title: Matching
home.technology.cards.pricing.micro: Distance, urgency, capacity & service level—all transparent.
home.technology.cards.pricing.outcome: Fair prices emerge from real supply-demand dynamics.
home.technology.cards.pricing.title: Pricing
home.technology.cards.routing.micro: Seamless flow across carriers and modes—no empty backhauls.
home.technology.cards.routing.outcome: Chain multi-hop journeys through microhubs as efficient handoff points.
home.technology.cards.routing.title: Routing
home.technology.description: Real-time matching. Multi-hop routing. Fair pricing. Carbon tracking.
home.technology.description2: Detour-aware multi-hop chaining under time windows — with verified handoffs at every step.
home.technology.heading: Intelligence Built Into Movement.
home.technology.label: GoLynk Technology
home.technology.underTheHood.label: Under the Hood →
home.technology.underTheHood.result: Result: Scale from parcels to institutional supply chains without adding vehicles.
home.technology.underTheHood.text: Real-time data intake (GPS, shipment specs, availability). Multi-agent reinforcement learning balances supply & demand. Constraint satisfaction handles weight, temp, windows, modes instantly. Economic equilibrium emerges from pricing signals. Every decision is logged and explainable.

home.trust.cards.compliance.description: Built for regulatory and ESG requirements.

home.trust.cards.kyc.title: KYC & Verification
home.trust.cards.pod.description: Photo or signature at every handoff point.
home.trust.cards.pod.title: Proof of Delivery
home.trust.cards.support.title: 24/7 Support
home.trust.closing: Every shipment moves through verified networks with complete visibility.
